// f - floor
// x - wall
// w - water
// g - goal
// b - snow ball
// _ - nothing

// The starting position
0, 0

// The back layer
f f f x f f x
f f f f f f x
x f x f f f x
x f x f f f x
f f w f f w g
f f x f x x x

// The front layer.
_ _ _ _ _ _ _
_ _ _ _ _ _ _
_ _ _ b _ _ _
_ b _ _ _ _ _
_ _ _ _ _ _ _
_ _ _ _ _ _ _
_ x _ _ _ _ _
